sentences.en: A conical or heart - shaped green fruit with edible, sweet, white flesh.
sentences.cn: 一种圆锥形或心形绿色果实,可食用,果肉白色, 味甘甜.

sentences.en: All three seemed sharp and conical in figure.
sentences.cn: 这三座山都呈尖尖的圆锥形.

sentences.en: And a new type sphere - conical roller and globoid cam graduator is designed.
sentences.cn: 并在此基础上设计出了一种新型的球锥滚子弧面凸轮转位工作台.

sentences.en: Figure 3 - 10 illustrates the result of a study or conical shrouds.
sentences.cn: 图3-10表明了对锥形外壳的研究结果.

sentences.en: Geometry: Inverse conical with 15 degrees slope.
Snapshots of Health conical roof, flowers white.
sentences.cn: 圆锥形花絮顶生, 花白色.

sentences.en: Spring Processing: Compression springs, disc springs, toys spring, shaped spring, conical springs.
sentences.cn: 弹簧加工: 压缩弹簧 、 碟形弹簧 、 玩具弹簧 、 异型弹簧 、 锥形弹簧.

sentences.en: The buds are conical or pyramidal in shape.
sentences.cn: 花蕾呈圆锥形或金字塔形。

sentences.en: The conical configuration of the appendix makes obstruction of the lumen unlikely.
sentences.cn: 阑尾呈圆锥形,不易造成腔内梗阻.

sentences.en: The firework rocket has a cylindrical body and a conical head.
sentences.cn: 烟火火箭有一圆柱形壳体和一锥形头部.

sentences.en: The present device is also called a conical pendulum.
sentences.cn: 上述装置也称为圆锥摆.

sentences.en: The towers were topped with conical roofs.
sentences.cn: 这些塔的最上面是锥形顶.

sentences.en: There are usually 3 or 4 conical cups having rolled or beaded edges.
sentences.cn: 一般有三或四个滚边的或卷边的锥形杯.

sentences.en: This coniferous tree has a conical silhouette and thick bark.
sentences.cn: 这种针叶树为圆锥形,厚厚的树皮.

sentences.en: To develop conical cavities during solidification.
sentences.cn: 形成缩管凝固时形成缩孔.
